title: Travel While You Work: The Ultimate Guide
description:
Travel While You Work: The Ultimate Guide to Running a Business from Anywhere by Mish Slade

English | 2015 | ISBN: 1516832841 | 358 pages | EPUB 


Freelancers are packing up their laptops and setting up shop in Thai cafes and Spanish coworking spaces, while entire companies are realising that they can slash their costs and have happier employees by allowing them to work from wherever they want.

Being able to see the world outside of a two-week vacation is pretty great, but it's not just about the travel. It's about doing away with all the constraints of office life Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the commute, the cubicle, the bad coffee Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and finding freedom in a more flexible way of working and living
